CustomField.description: This milestone review's priority. The priority is "High" if it is either time-sensitive or there are dependent proposals. Otherwise the priority is "Standard".
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Time_sensitive__c, Has_dependent_proposals__c ), "2 - High", "1 - Standard" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This milestone review's priority is "High" if it is either time-sensitive or there are dependent proposals. Otherwise the priority is "Standard".
CustomField.label: Review priority
